title: "Ann Arbor AI company Clinc looks to upscale under new CEO"
excerpt: "With a new chief executive and a growing focus on serving the financial services sector, AI startup Clinc Inc. still has some \"phenomenal\" problems to overcome, according to new CEO Jon Newhard. The Ann Arbor-based company has gained buzzworthy attention in recent years as its Siri-like voice-controlled software has been put to use in mobile-banking applications."
